text: František Trkal (born 10 April 1970) is a Czech former cyclist. He competed in two events at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==Major results== ;1988 :1st Overall Course de la Paix Juniors ;1989 :1st Stage 5 Bayern Rundfahrt ;1991 :10th Overall Peace Race ;1993 :2nd Overall Peace Race ::1st Stages 3 & 5 ;1994 :2nd Overall Tour du Vaucluse :3rd Overall Peace Race ::1st Stage 1 ;1995 :1st Overall Okolo Slovenska :5th Overall Peace Race ;1996 :1st Stage 6 Peace Race :1st Stage 2 International Tour of Rhodes :5th HEW Cyclassics ;1999 :3rd Road race, National Road Championships ;2000 :4th Overall International Tour of Rhodes ::1st Prologue & Stages 2 & 4 ;2001 :1st Overall Okolo Slovenska ::1st Stage 2 ;2002 :4th Overall Okolo Slovenska ;2004 :8th Poreč Trophy ==References== ==External links== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Czechoslovakia Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:People from Litomyšl
title: František Trkal
